events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the Software Engineer position. Their resume shows relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering due to their strong background as a software developer and experience with multiple programming languages.
Assigned the recruiting team member John Smith to proceed with the candidate's screening and coordinate all subsequent interview steps.
Completed a positive initial phone screening with the candidate, discussing their technical skills, previous experience, and motivation for joining our engineering team.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to proceed with the technical interview stage, expressing strong interest in the role and company culture.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate for April 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess coding abilities and problem-solving skills in a live environment.
